subject: Fix layout bugs, logo drag-drop, and text overlay issues
body:
- Fix image not displaying in column/row layouts (use flex sizing)
- Fix text duplication in 3-section layouts
- Remove redundant layout preview from Layout tab
- Fix logo drag-drop (add onDrop/onDragOver handlers)
- Fix text vertical align on image (respect user setting)
- Fix text sizes on image (use consistent font multipliers)
